author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Harima-Kyowa to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 27(Reuters) - Harima-Kyowa Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 70,000 shares of its stock at the price of 2,431 yen per share, on the Tokyo Stock Exchange on Feb. 28
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 1,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/oUHjSS
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
